text: "Let Forever Be" is a 1999 song by English electronic duo The Chemical Brothers. It is the second single from their third studio album Surrender. It features the uncredited vocals of Noel Gallagher from Oasis. It went to number 9 in the United Kingdom, number 7 in Scotland, number 89 in the Netherlands, number 30 in New Zealand, number 23 in Ireland and number 2 in Hungary. ==Track listings== Standard CD, 12-inch, and cassette single # "Let Forever Be" # "The Diamond Sky" # "Studio K" European CD single # "Let Forever Be" (album version) # "Studio K" == References == Category:1999 songs Category:The Chemical Brothers songs Category:Alternative rock songs
title: Let Forever Be
